title: client plugin segfault based on camera plugin tutorial

content.raw:
Note: this bug is not caused by pull request #561.  On Ubuntu Precise, while testing pull request #561 against the [gzclient plugin tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/1.9/plugins/camera_plugin), (starting `gzserver` separately), the following backtrace results from `gzclient`:

~~~
$ gdb --args gzclient -g libsystem_gui.so

...

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
_int_malloc (av=0x7ffff3bd4720, bytes=7280658) at malloc.c:3879
3879	malloc.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  _int_malloc (av=0x7ffff3bd4720, bytes=7280658) at malloc.c:3879
#1  0x00007ffff389efc5 in __GI___libc_malloc (bytes=7280658) at malloc.c:2924
#2  0x00007ffff41a2ded in operator new(unsigned long) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007ffff41a2f09 in operator new[](unsigned long) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007fffafa8a9e9 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.7.4/RenderSystem_GL.so
#5  0x00007ffff7573a35 in gazebo::rendering::Camera::PostRender (this=0x2e0cbb0)
    at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:487
#6  0x00000000004ac143 in operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:1013
#7  Signal (this=<optimized out>) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/common/Event.hh:126
#8  operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/common/Event.hh:119
#9  gazebo::gui::GLWidget::paintEvent (this=<optimized out>, _e=0x7fffffffd200)
    at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:211
#10 0x00007ffff5d7d0f6 in QWidget::event (this=0x13ecb50, event=0x7fffffffd200) at kernel/qwidget.cpp:8508
#11 0x00007ffff5d2c894 in notify_helper (e=0x7fffffffd200, receiver=0x13ecb50, this=0xd068d0) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4559
#12 QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper (this=0xd068d0, receiver=0x13ecb50, e=0x7fffffffd200) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4531
#13 0x00007ffff5d31713 in QApplication::notify (this=0xd1f370, receiver=0x13ecb50, e=0x7fffffffd200) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4420
#14 0x00007ffff5809e9c in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal (this=0xd1f370, receiver=0x13ecb50, event=0x7fffffffd200)
    at kernel/qcoreapplication.cpp:876
#15 0x00007ffff5d78d96 in sendSpontaneousEvent (event=0x7fffffffd200, receiver=0x13ecb50)
    at ../../include/QtCore/../../src/corelib/kernel/qcoreapplication.h:234
#16 QWidgetPrivate::drawWidget (this=0x13ed360, pdev=0x13ecb60, rgn=..., offset=..., flags=3, sharedPainter=0x0, backingStore=0x0)
    at kernel/qwidget.cpp:5585
#17 0x00007ffff5f44787 in QWidgetPrivate::repaint_sys (this=0x13ed360, rgn=...) at painting/qbackingstore.cpp:1656
#18 0x00007ffff5d6fa64 in QWidgetPrivate::syncBackingStore (this=0x13ed360) at kernel/qwidget.cpp:1888
#19 0x00007ffff5d7d60c in QWidget::event (this=0x13ecb50, event=0x65bf540) at kernel/qwidget.cpp:8655
#20 0x00007ffff5d2c894 in notify_helper (e=0x65bf540, receiver=0x13ecb50, this=0xd068d0) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4559
#21 QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper (this=0xd068d0, receiver=0x13ecb50, e=0x65bf540) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4531
#22 0x00007ffff5d31713 in QApplication::notify (this=0xd1f370, receiver=0x13ecb50, e=0x65bf540) at kernel/qapplication.cpp:4420
#23 0x00007ffff5809e9c in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal (this=0xd1f370, receiver=0x13ecb50, event=0x65bf540)
    at kernel/qcoreapplication.cpp:876
#24 0x00007ffff580dc6a in sendEvent (event=0x65bf540, receiver=0x13ecb50)
    at ../../include/QtCore/../../src/corelib/kernel/qcoreapplication.h:231
#25 QCoreApplicationPrivate::sendPostedEvents (receiver=0x0, event_type=0, data=0x947bc0) at kernel/qcoreapplication.cpp:1500
#26 0x00007ffff5838f93 in sendPostedEvents () at ../../include/QtCore/../../src/corelib/kernel/qcoreapplication.h:236
#27 postEventSourceDispatch (s=<optimized out>) at kernel/qeventdispatcher_glib.cpp:279
#28 0x00007ffff1220d53 in g_main_context_dispatch () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#29 0x00007ffff12210a0 in ?? () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#30 0x00007ffff1221164 in g_main_context_iteration () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#31 0x00007ffff58393bf in QEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents (this=0xd2d030, flags=...) at kernel/qeventdispatcher_glib.cpp:424
#32 0x00007ffff5dd4d5e in QGuiEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents (this=<optimized out>, flags=...)
    at kernel/qguieventdispatcher_glib.cpp:204
#33 0x00007ffff5808c82 in QEventLoop::processEvents (this=<optimized out>, flags=...) at kernel/qeventloop.cpp:149
#34 0x00007ffff5808ed7 in QEventLoop::exec (this=0x7fffffffdde0, flags=...) at kernel/qeventloop.cpp:204
#35 0x00007ffff580df67 in QCoreApplication::exec () at kernel/qcoreapplication.cpp:1148
#36 0x00000000004b4c7c in gazebo::gui::run (_argc=3, _argv=0x7fffffffdf48) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:203
#37 0x0000000000495c09 in main (_argc=<optimized out>, _argv=<optimized out>) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_1.9/gazebo/gui/main.cc:23
(gdb) 
~~~

$ gdb --args gzclient -g libsystem_gui.so

...

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
